By forcing legitimate asylum seekers‚Äîincluding women, children, & families‚Äîto remain in Mexico in conditions that threaten their health & safety, we are needlessly prolonging their suffering. Unfortunately, for this Admin, that has too often been their goal. This cannot stand.
